plot: A bitter young man searches for his birth mother to deliver his justice for being given up at birth, not knowing his biological mother has hired a private investigator to locate him.
title: Postpartum
plot_es: A bitter young man searches for his birth mother to deliver his justice for being given up at birth, not knowing his biological mother has hired a private investigator to locate him.
